alert.note: Alert for Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 28 at 8:04PM MST until December 29 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches. * WHERE...Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, and Rampart Range. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage. The commute this evening as well as Thursday morning over Monument Hill could be hazardous.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft
